arts.ttl: Second La Liga manager of the season sacked as Real Valladolid take action with Paulo Pezzolano
arts.sum: Real Valladolid’s first season back in La Liga has not been easy, and after 15 matchdays, they are currently bottom of the standings. Saturday’s 5-0 home thrashing at the hands of Atletico Madrid increased the pressure on head coach Paulo Pezzolano, and in the end, it has been too much. Just hours after the defeat […] The post Second La Liga manager of the season sacked as Real Valladolid take action with Paulo Pezzolano appeared first on Football España.
